title: How to make my Firefox Color theme apply on startup
content: I've created a Firefox Color theme that I really like, but it doesn't persist when I close and reopen Firefox, I have to go to Firefox color and enable it manually each time. I've tried downloading the .xpi and .zip and uploading those to the "Install Add-on From File" option in the themes section of about:addons, but it says it couldn't be installed because it's corrupt. Any help would be greatly appreciated
creator: altizer16

title: 2 night ago I was on my facebook with my friends and last night and tonight I am unable to get on it say firefox blocked the sight. Someone please help me
content: 2 Night ago I was on my Facebook page tonight I can not get on it say Firefox did not connect. I don't understand why because I was on 2 night ago and all was good. Firefox says it not a secure site Please help me I would really appreciate. Thank you Penny
creator: pennyc2005

title: Login details
content:
Hi there,

I am tryign to access my accoutn with De'Longhi via https://www.delonghi.com/en-gb/login.

However, the login and password boxes don't show, while the New User boxes are visible.

They also don't show in Chrome, so I think it might be a McAfee/Windows Defender issue, but I am not sure how to use the debugging in Firefox to help me see what might be happening.

Can you help, please?

Kind regards,

Rui
creator: rnbdomingues
